name: Run Stars: Jump on Helix Road
name_original: Run Stars: Jump on Helix Road
description:
Touch the right half of the screen to jump, touch the left half of the screen to roll. Start your adventure with the obstacles on the helix road.

Game features:
- Simple and smooth control
- Unique cool running gameplay
- Choice of up to 13 characters

Come on! try to jump up on helix road and beat the highest score on the world leaderboard.
